title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters.
EB: The package view in the background should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should revert all changes made to working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the working set selection dialog. 
2. Remove a working set. 
3. Observe the package view refiltering immediately in the background.
